truthfully

to launch a campaign on a platform of

reported on the auction of a portrait of

before going further I want to apologize

today I am here to tell the truth about

Trump did not directly tell me to lie to

at the same time I was actively

he was telling me to lie there were at

you need to know that mr. Trump's

because mr. Trump had made clear to me

incredible daughter and son when I

countless times throughout my childhood
you my wife and you might children are
the air that I breathe so to my Laura

have always tried to live a life of

ingrained in my siblings in me since

Holocaust thanks to the compassion and
selfless acts of
he was helped by many who put themselves

and mom and dad I am sorry I let you

call it 3:00 a.m. if they needed help I

and for the record individual number one

reason I have come here to apologize to

American people
accordingly let me now tell you about

working very closely with him for more

monopolized my life at first I worked

thereafter mr. Trump brought me into his

mr. Trump is an enigma he is complicated

all
but the bed far outweighs the good and
